data.title: Steven Zaillian
data.meta_description: Steven Zaillian is an American Academy Award-winning screenwriter. In addition to the films which garnered him Academy Award nominations, he has also served as screenwriter on such films as Clear and Present Danger, A Civil Action, American Gangster, and The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo. 66th...
data.text:
Zaillian at the 2011 Writers Guild Awards 5 Nominations / 1 Win Role Screenwriter Born January 30, 1953 Fresno, California, USA

Steven Zaillian is an American Academy Award-winning screenwriter. In addition to the films which garnered him Academy Award nominations, he has also served as screenwriter on such films as Clear and Present Danger, A Civil Action, American Gangster, and The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo.

Wins[]

66th Academy Awards, 1993

Best Adapted Screenplay — Schindler's List

Nominations[]

63rd Academy Awards, 1990

Best Adapted Screenplay — Awakenings

66th Academy Awards, 1993

Best Adapted Screenplay — Schindler's List

75th Academy Awards, 2002

Best Original Screenplay — Gangs of New York (shared with Jay Cocks and Kenneth Lonergan)

84th Academy Awards, 2011

Best Adapted Screenplay — Moneyball (shared with Aaron Sorkin and Stan Chervin)
